content.query:
--count the number of athletes from each country
select NOC,count(*) as number_athletes
from athletes
group by NOC
order by number_athletes desc;

--Calculate total medals won by each country
select Team_NOC,Total
from medals
group by Team_NOC,Total;

--calculate the average number of entries by gender for each discipline
select Discipline, AVG(Female) AS Avg_female, AVG(Male) AS Avg_Male
from gender
group by Discipline
